amendment.description: To modify effective dates relating to the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Space Acquisition and Integration and the Service Acquisition Executive of the Department of the Air Force for Space Systems and Programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 4775 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 3867. (consideration: CR S8756; text: CR S8756) To modify effective dates relating to the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Space Acquisition and Integration and the Service Acquisition Executive of the Department of the Air Force for Space Systems and Programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4775 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 3867.
